name: Masked HEROs
author: RaveyBaby
notes:
Played a couple different variations and this is the one that worked. I had Decider originally but I think both of his effects are lackluster right now. Don't really want to pull any heroes from grave since you wanna banish for effects, and the non target for 6* and higher doesn't really matter in this meta
Extra Deck is Anki x3, Trinity x1, Dangerous x1
